Action.name: BELTALOWDA_TOGGLE_UI
Action.Down: if Beltalowda.UI and Beltalowda.UI.GroupUltimateDisplay then Beltalowda.UI.GroupUltimateDisplay.Toggle() end

Action.name: BELTALOWDA_TOGGLE_SELECTOR
Action.Down: if Beltalowda.UI and Beltalowda.UI.ClientUltimateSelector then Beltalowda.UI.ClientUltimateSelector.Toggle() end

Action.name: BELTALOWDA_TOGGLE_LOCK
Action.Down: if Beltalowda.UI and Beltalowda.UI.GroupUltimateDisplay then Beltalowda.UI.GroupUltimateDisplay.ToggleLock() end if Beltalowda.UI and Beltalowda.UI.ClientUltimateSelector then Beltalowda.UI.ClientUltimateSelector.ToggleLock() end

Action.name: BELTALOWDA_CYCLE_ULTIMATE
Action.Down: if Beltalowda.UI and Beltalowda.UI.ClientUltimateSelector then Beltalowda.UI.ClientUltimateSelector.CycleUltimate() end
